member.name: SecPkgContext_EapKeyBlock
member.summary: The SecPkgContext_EapKeyBlock structure contains key data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol. For information about the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol, see http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2716.txt.

member.name: SecPkgContext_EapKeyBlock.rgbKeys
member.summary: An array of 128 bytes that contain key data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol.

member.name: SecPkgContext_EapKeyBlock.rgbIVs
member.summary: An array of 64 bytes that contain initialization vector data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol.
